item.title: Running Counter-strike 1.6 and CSGO in kubernetes !
item.description:
Yee so it was a long time ago when I spend days playing counter strike 1.6. And now when i got some more power full servers and some time I was thinking of setting up a some counter-strike server for me and some friends so we can play.

I have a nice kubernetes cluster in my garage and a run all my stuff inside kubernetes so it was natural to make them into a kubernetes deploy.
